casebody.data:
Claus Zimmerman HANSEN, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
BANK OF AMERICA, NATIONAL ASSOCIATION AS TRUSTEE FOR WASHINGTON MUTUAL MORTGAGE PASS-THROUGH CERTIFICATES SERIES 2007-0A4 TRUST, US as the Successor Trustee to Bank of America, Barbara Hindman, JP Morgan Chase Bank, N.A., Defendants-Appellees,
and
Doe Defendants 1-20, Defendants NO. CAAP-15-0000961 Intermediate Court of Appeals of Hawai'i. March 4, 2019

SUMMARY DISPOSITION ORDER

Vacate. Remand.
